entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [release/9.0] HostActivation installer tests are expecting 9.0.0 but getting 9.0.0-ci in PRs #108994
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose NullExternalScopeProvider and NullScope #108993
    Future
  • When using the voice playback API provided by Microsoft, I cannot get all the installed voice packets in the system #108991
  • SOAP Service Need To Accept Content-Type Of "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". #108989
  • JIT Focus Area for .NET 10 #108988
    10.0.0
  • CMake Error: 'arm64' is an unsupported architecture #108987
  • Dataset - project targeting .net framework 4.8 and .net 8 - DiagnosticId error in auto generated code in dataset #108986
  • Icmp only triggers when socket is disposed #108984
  • NetworkInterface.GetIPProperties() does not report MulticastAddresses for Android Always #108983
  • [Android] System.TypeInitializationException on app startup #108979
  • .NET 9, ILC reports trimmer warnings for `k__BackingField` for auto-properties #108978
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Measure browser-bench performance with O3 #108976
    10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test build doesn't make crossgen2 executable in RISC-V. #108973
  • [Wasm][net9] MSBuild `EmscriptenVersion` is still 3.1.34 #108972
  • [NET9] [REGRESSION] Gmail API fail with TieredCompilation disabled #108969
  • Requesting a backport of #100774 into .NET 8 #108966
  • [Mono] ves_icall_RuntimeType_GetInterfaces generates an extra Implemented Interface #108964
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: SciMark2.kernel Regression on 10/15/2024 8:19:02 AM #108980
  • On Linux, `System.Diagnostics.Process.StartTime` is not stable #108959
  • .NET 9 iOS / HybridGlobalization: currency symbols / currency names not available #108958
    10.0.0
  • [WASM] UnsafeAccessor doesn't work in some circumstances. #108957
  • Build crash using brew clang 19 on m3 #108956

Closed

  • .NET - `System.Text.Json.Schema.JsonSchemaExporter` failing to include `required` property #109000
  • Test failure: profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.cmd #108829
    10.0.0
  • LINQ Sum extension returns 0 instead of null #108985
  • Error message for missing service registration is misleading when using AddHttpClient<> #104386
    Future
  • Consider adding JsonDocument.TryParse() #108974
  • `DebuggerTests` other than `WasmTestOnChrome` timeouts in CI #108921
  • Memory leak in HttpClient #108741
  • [API Proposal]: Volatile barrier APIs #98837
    Future
  • Intermittent AccessViolation and NullReference exceptions in reflection-based JsonSerializer #108926
  • OverloadResolutionPriority does not work for extension methods accross different classes #108960
  • Proposal: Add new property for getting process path #14319

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109003
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Remove *.pp file #108998
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108995
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Enable few tests #108977
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update remarks for `IsRealNumber` #108965
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Include loongarch64 in supported nativeaot RIDs. #108962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Add security design docs for Dictionary, HashCode, and StringComparer #108864
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109001
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108952
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108982
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108870
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Couple minor docs updates #108453
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Allow the cdac build tool to roll forward to whatever SDK is available (prerelease or otherwise) #108946
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix HostApiInvokerApp test app setting DllImportResolver for hostfxr #108954
    area-Host
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Assign VN for COMMA in gtWrapWithSideEffects #108955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Use loop-aware RPO for initial block layout #108903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix JIT refusing to inline methods accessing static readonly arrays #108953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't run trim-unfriendly ConcurrentDictionary test #108925
    area-System.Collections
  • 2 accounting fixes #108880
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2563198 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove redundant sign/zero extension for SIMD broadcasts #108824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ldsfld quirk #108606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use `BitVec` with `bbPostorderNum` key to track visited blocks during value numbering #108943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] Include version error message when missing WASI SDK #107599
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [browser] update incorrect references #108352
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
